name: Kweebec Wooden Sword

description: Reinforced steel tempered with Orbis crystals for added bite.

name: Luminite Edge
description: A rare sword that shimmers with Luminite resonance.

name: Varyn Shadowshiv
description: Favored by Varyn assassins—deadly when striking from the dark.

name: Skysong Arcanist Staff
description: Channels Skysong magic into devastating arcane bursts.

name: Forager Leathers
description: Lightweight leathers used by Kweebec gatherers.

name: Borea Vanguard Mail
description: Standard issue armor for the Borea guard posts.

name: Guardian Bulwark
description: Infused with Sunstone and void wards, it protects against depth horrors.

description: Restores a portion of vitality using Kweebec herbs.

name: Grand Life Elixir

name: Mana Dew
description: Condensed Skysong essence to restore mana.

name: Focus Elixir
description: Sharpens spellcasting senses for a short time.

name: Ancient Bark

name: Void Essence
description: Captured residue from Varyn corruption.

description: Smelted iron ready for forging.

description: A sturdy coral fragment perfect for alchemy infusions.

description: Glittering scale shed by the sirens of the shoals.

description: A molten nucleus captured from the heart of the Ashen wastes.
